author: dinyar
body:
#### PR description:

uGMT now uses the unconstrained pT from OMTF, so we need to unpack it. I've added the functionality to pack and unpack it in this PR.

This is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44543 because we need this deployed to the online DQM to avoid data-emulator mismatches.
title: Unpack displaced pT from OMTF at the uGMT inputs (backport for 14_0_X)
